subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The U.S. team, under a new captain, Tom Lehman, begins play in the 36th Ryder Cup on Friday at the K Club in Straffan, Ireland.
snippet: The U.S. team, under a new captain, Tom Lehman, begins play in the 36th Ryder Cup on Friday at the K Club in Straffan, Ireland.
